settings.subheading: passion for timeless designs and exceptional craftsmanship
settings.title: Welcome to Paoti
settings.text: We are a brand dedicated to crafting handmade bags that redefine elegance, style, and sophistication.

settings.title: A symbol of Personal Style &  Individuality
settings.text: At Paoti, we believe that a handbag is more than just an accessory; it is an Each of our meticulously handcrafted bags tells a unique story, blending contemporary trends with classic elements to create a seamless fusion of modernity and tradition.

settings.title: We Strive for your Satisfaction
settings.text: We believe that exceptional customer service is paramount. Our knowledgeable and friendly team is always on hand to assist you in finding the perfect handbag or answer any inquiries you may have. We aim to create a seamless shopping experience, from the moment you browse our collection to the prompt delivery of your coveted piece.
Use a video to get a customer's attention

settings.title: Commitment To Quality
settings.text: We source the finest materials, selecting only the most supple leathers, luxurious fabrics, and opulent embellishments. Every stitch is executed with precision, ensuring impeccable finishes that stand the test of time. We take pride in the attention to detail that goes into each and every one of our creations, resulting in handbags that exude unparalleled elegance and sophistication.

settings.title: Dedication to Authenticity and Sustainability
settings.text: By supporting local craftsmanship, we not only preserve age-old traditions but also contribute to the empowerment of communities. We strive to minimize our environmental impact by carefully sourcing eco-friendly materials and implementing sustainable practices throughout our production process.

Thank you for choosing Paoti as your destination for luxury handbags. We invite you to explore our different collections, discover the artistry behind each creation, and embark on a journey of timeless elegance.

settings.title: About The Founder
settings.text: Diana Barboza's story is one of resilience, determination, and entrepreneurship. Diana has worked her whole life and is a committed wife and mother After years of saving and planning, her hard work paid off when she finally started her own luxury fashion brand, PAOTI. Combining her eye for fashion with her industrial engineering background, she was able to start a brand with one purpose: to empower women that are struggling like she once did to be strong, unique and determined.

settings.title: Have A Vision
settings.text: However, in order to do this, her products had to be aligned with her mission. The only way to make this happen and to really empower women to feel exclusive was to start with unique products. Every single Paoti bag is one of a kind, as in, there is only one of that model in the entire world. All of the bags are handmade and carefully crafted by master craftsmen and artisans.

settings.title: Give Back
settings.text: Despite her success Diana has never forgotten where she came from. She is committed to giving back to her community and helping other young women like herself pursue their dreams.She regularly volunteers at local communities and talks about the importance of hard work, determination, and perseverance.

settings.title: Inspire Others
settings.text: Diana's story is an inspiration to us all. It shows that with hard work and determination, anything is possible. Despite facing many obstacles and setbacks, Diana never gave up on her dream of starting her own business. She is now living proof that with passion, dedication, and a strong work ethic, anyone can achieve their goals.
